PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FlowMeterTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Common attributes of a flow meter type

PropertyDef.Name: ReadOutType
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of the form that readout from the meter takes. In the case of a dial read out, this may comprise multiple dials that give a cumulative reading and/or a mechanical odometer.

PropertyDef.Name: RemoteReading
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the meter has a connection for remote reading through connection of a communication device (set TRUE) or not (set FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: IsMain
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the meter is the main meter on the system. If FALSE, it is a submeter.
